name: Auto Tag and Publish

on:
  push:
    branches:
      - main

jobs:
  create-tag:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    permissions:
      contents: write  # Required to create and push tags
    steps:
      - name: Checkout code
        uses: actions/checkout@v5
        with:
          fetch-depth: 0  # Fetch all history for tags

      - name: Configure Git
        run: |
          git config user.name "github-actions[bot]"
          git config user.email "github-actions[bot]@users.noreply.github.com"

      - name: Calculate next version
        id: next-version
        run: |
          # Fetch all tags
          git fetch --tags
          
          # Get the latest v1.x.x tag
          LATEST_TAG=$(git tag -l "v1.*.*" | sort -V | tail -n 1)
          
          if [ -z "$LATEST_TAG" ]; then
            # No v1.x.x tags exist, start with v1.5.0
            NEXT_MINOR=5
            echo "No existing v1.x.x tags found, starting with v1.5.0"
          else
            # Extract minor version number from the tag (e.g., v1.5.0 -> 5)
            MINOR=$(echo "$LATEST_TAG" | sed -E 's/v1\.([0-9]+)\..*/\1/')
            echo "Latest tag: $LATEST_TAG (minor version: $MINOR)"
            
            # If latest minor version is less than 5, start from 5
            if [ "$MINOR" -lt 5 ]; then
              NEXT_MINOR=5
            else
              # Increment minor version
              NEXT_MINOR=$((MINOR + 1))
            fi
          fi
          
          # Set patch to 0 and create next version
          NEXT_VERSION="v1.$NEXT_MINOR.0"
          
          echo "Next version: $NEXT_VERSION"
          echo "next_version=$NEXT_VERSION" >> $GITHUB_OUTPUT

      - name: Create and push tag
        run: |
          NEXT_VERSION="${{ steps.next-version.outputs.next_version }}"
          
          # Check if tag already exists (shouldn't happen, but safety check)
          if git rev-parse "$NEXT_VERSION" >/dev/null 2>&1; then
            echo "⚠️  Tag $NEXT_VERSION already exists, skipping tag creation"
            exit 0
          fi
          
          # Create the tag
          git tag "$NEXT_VERSION"
          
          # Push the tag (this will trigger publish-mcp.yml)
          git push origin "$NEXT_VERSION"
          
          echo "✅ Created and pushed tag: $NEXT_VERSION"
